name: 1000 Games: Volume 3
summary:
1000 Games: Volume 3 is, as the name states, a compilation of one thousand games which the publisher attests is a collection of one thousand games which includes neither shareware games nor demo games.

The games in this compilation come as four separate groups, each installs separately:* Arcade and Action Championship: This is a version of Selectsoft's Arcade and Action XP Championship

Pod Drop and Stack Championship: This is a version of Selectsoft's Pop! Drop! & Stack! XP Championship
360 Games Collection: This is composed of versions of three separate Selectsoft products. There are one hundred and sixty games from Sudoku Mania!, one hundred levels from Wacky Bird Hunter, and one hundred levels from 3003 Crystal Mazes.
500 Solitaire Games: this is a version of Selectsoft's Solitaire XP Championship complete with game creator and editor. This version has far fewer different backgrounds and card backs and just two styles of card face.
